name: MASS_SHAPE
description: This table holds information about the shape of a mass documented within the mammography drawing tools if QuickForms are being utilized. SmartForms within the drawing tools will file data to the SmartData Element structures.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MASS_SHAPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The shape of mass category ID for the mass finding documented in the BI-RADS questionnaire.
